S.FORM: alang Rahu' ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 84 buwan, 294 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96 kyan ku 281 hi, binah ga,, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4 kyan ku 13 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 90 , Amis 2 , Bunun 1 , binah lihuyan s'uli 2 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Rahu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Rahu' hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Rahu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Rahu' hya' ga Hbun sinqumi. tay 'llaw na Rahu' hya' ga Qus. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
